companies.name: Abnormal AI
companies.reason: Abnormal AI, formerly Abnormal Security, is trending due to its focus on AI-native human behavior security, particularly in preventing socially engineered cyberattacks via email. They have recently rebranded to reflect their evolution and have been recognized as a CNBC Disruptor 50 company.

companies.name: Darktrace
companies.reason: Darktrace is trending because of its AI-powered cybersecurity solutions, particularly its ability to detect and respond to 'low and slow' cyber threats. They have also announced the opening of a new deployment center and corporate office in Dallas, Texas, indicating expansion and growth.
